name: Air China Disappoints - Business Class Review from Heathrow to Beijing
description:
I was really looking forward to this one – flying on one of Air China’s new Airbus A350s featuring the fancy new 1-2-1 business class.  But sadly it was not meant to be – I arrived at the gate to find that instead I’d be flying an old A330 featuring a rather dated business class product. 

Here’s the links I mentioned in the video:

Mind Plus Beauty:  https://mindplusbeauty.com/
Westjet 787 Business Class Review:  https://youtu.be/OeP2mysHvus

This Air China business class flight was from London Heathrow through to Beijing.  For most airlines Heathrow is seen as a flagship route so they feature their best business class product and service.  Unfortunately Air China doesn’t seem to work this way.  This Air China Business Class review tells the story.

 
Route:     London Heathrow (LHR) to Beijing Capital Airport, China (PEK)
Length:   5,072 miles, 9:48 hrs
Flight:     CA856  Seat 11A
Aircraft:  Airbus A330-200  registration B-6132 (July 2008)
When:    23 Nov 2019

Camera:  Panasonic HC-VX1


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.

Q&A Video:       https://youtu.be/6VoRFtNDC04
The Business Trip:   https://youtu.be/xgNXuBTyDTQ
The Business Trip – IndoChina:  https://youtu.be/pkNcpk2whLU
